name: aeneas-verify
description: Gutter icons and hover tooltips showing formal verification status of Rust functions extracted by Aeneas

aeneas-verify.jsonPath.description: Path to the verification status JSON file (relative to workspace root)

aeneas-verify.showExtracted.description: Show a grey dot for functions that are extracted but have no spec

aeneas-verify.specsBasePath.description: Base path for generated spec files (relative to workspace root)

aeneas-verify.copyrightHolder.description: Copyright holder for generated spec file headers (e.g., 'Beneficial AI Foundation'). Leave empty to omit the copyright block.

aeneas-verify.licenseType.description: License type for generated spec file headers

aeneas-verify.defaultAuthors.description: Default authors line for generated spec file headers

aeneas-verify.defaultImports.description: Additional Lean import entries for generated spec files (e.g., ['Math.Basic']). Each is prefixed with the crate name. 'Aeneas' and '{Crate}.Funs' are always included.

aeneas-verify.openDeclarations.description: Lean open declarations used in generated spec files

commands.title: Aeneas Verify: Open Lean Spec File
Aeneas Verify: Create Lean Spec File
